title: Drawing, "Design for necklace, "Colliers"", 1982
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and wash, gouache, graphite on white wove paper
signed: Signed in pen and black ink, lower right corner:  Gilles Derain / 82
inscribed: In pen and black ink, in upper center section of sheet, just to right of drawing: no. 3 / fin
description: Torque style necklace design with entwined overlay of additional metal with red jewels inset.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for necklace, "Colliers"", 1982.
1982. Pen and black ink, brush and wash, gouache, graphite on white wove paper. Gift of Gilles Derain. 1995-61-4.
